title: Looking to purchase T4 catcher(s)/Also Old Mill Cabinet
author: Vintagecatcher

posts.post_title: Looking to purchase T4 catcher(s)/Also Old Mill Cabinet
posts.post_content:
I'd love to add a T4 Obak Cabinet to my PCL collection. If anyone has any of the catchers such as Berry, Ryan etc. that they are willing to sell, please let me know. 

I'm also interested in purchasing an Old Mill Cabinet catcher such as Laughlin or Wingo.

Thanks,

Patrick
